content.rendered:
IV Cannula needle

  • With wing IV cannula needle

  • With-injection-port IV Cannula

  • Pen-like IV Cannula

The products should be used with disposable venous infusion setneedle, and usually apply togravity transfusion.

The disposable IV infusion set needle consist of protective cover, needle tube, needle handle, flexible tube, needle seat.

Product Application: Used together with disposable draw blood needle, for human body’s IV bloodsample collecting in clinical examination.

How to practice a good intravenous needle technique

If you want to practice a good venous needle technique, you must first adjust your mentality. You have to know that in an impatient situation, you can’t do this at all, and your patients are waiting for you to infuse him. After years of clinical practice, the more urgent you can’t get on. of. Therefore, when performing venipuncture, you must have a calm mentality.

In order to practice a good venous needle technique, it is also necessary to grasp the characteristics of the venous blood vessels. For example, the characteristics of venous blood vessels in obese people, the characteristics of venous blood vessels of bones (that is, the kind of sputum, which is completely skinny), where the blood vessels are slippery, not fixed enough, these must know, also There are spare blood vessels in the case of anxious conditions, such as blood vessels at the joints of the fingers, especially at the thumb.

If you want to practice a good venous needle technique, you need to pick the right blood vessels. When performing a venipuncture operation, select those blood vessels that are straight, thick, and elastic, avoiding the switch joints, and avoiding the venous valve. Sometimes you don’t get it, but you don’t pick it up.

If you want to practice the venous needle technique, you need to use the venipuncture operation. After the skin is disinfected, your hands should be well-fitted. The left hand should tighten the skin at the vein, and then the right hand can Hold the scalp needle for this operation. The purpose of tightening the skin is to fix the blood vessels, so that you can puncture.
